summary: I am a software enthusiast passionate about building projects and gaining hands-on experience to enhance my skills.
content: I enjoy working on projects that challenge me to grow and learn continuously. With strong problem-solving and analytical skills, I approach tasks methodically and creatively. In group work, I value collaboration and learning from others to deliver effective and meaningful solutions.
mission: My mission is to develop software that enhances skills, fosters learning, and contributes to impactful and collaborative projects.

experiences.description: Performed data cleaning, analysis, and dashboard support using Laravel, Vuexy, and Flutter applications.
Built a Rent Home REST API using NestJS, managed Postgres databases, integrated JSReport for reporting, and implemented JWT authentication.
Engaged in projects involving data analysis, machine learning, and software development to strengthen practical skills.

educations.description: Specialized in data analysis, machine learning, and big data technologies.
Focused on improving English language skills for academic and professional purposes.
Comprehensive training in frontend and backend web development technologies.

educations.institution: Ministry of Post and Telecommunication, CBRD Fund, ANT Technology Training Center & ThinkCyber
educations.description: Learning advanced techniques in ethical hacking and cybersecurity.
